title: First,
body: Let's give your topic a label. This is used to identify the code block.
extra: A label for a coversation about flowers would be "flowers".

title: Next,
body: Give your topic a prompt. This shown to the player to represent the topic.
extra: An example for a coversation about flowers could be "Do you like flowers?"

title: Now,
body: We'll set some categories for the topic. This is used for something but I don't know what :aaaaa:
extra: Example categories for a conversation about flowers could be "life" or "philosophy".

title: Finally,
body: Let's give Monika some dialogue and expressions and stuff.
extra: Press the face icon to set an expression for the line, and press the body button to set a pose.
